article.title: Status updates through M/G/1/1 queues with HARQ

multiple_choice_question.text: What does "AoI" stand for in the context of this article?
What type of channel is used for transmitting updates in the scenarios discussed in the article?
Which HARQ protocol, according to the article, generally yields better performance in terms of the average age of information?
What is the primary decision a transmitter needs to make when a new update arrives while the system is busy?
choices: Whether to store the new update in a buffer or discard it.
Whether to transmit both updates simultaneously using a multiplexing technique.
Whether to prioritize the new update over the one being transmitted (preemption) or not.
